trans-unit.target: 如果由对手所操控的咒语或异能使得你弃掉打肢怪，则改为将它放置进场且上面有两个+1/+1指示物，而非置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Feldon's Cane
trans-unit.target: 费顿的手杖

trans-unit.source: {T}, Remove Feldon's Cane from the game: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，将费顿的手杖移出对战：将你的坟墓场洗入你的牌库中。

trans-unit.source: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.
trans-unit.target: 费顿在若纳冰河中首度发现这手杖冻结其中；随后它们便逐一出土。

trans-unit.source: Grinning Totem
trans-unit.target: 微笑图腾像

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and remove it from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲微笑图腾像：从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张牌，并将它移出对战。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。 直到你下个维持开始，你可以使用该牌。 在你下个维持开始时，若你尚未使用它，则将它置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Mindless Automaton
trans-unit.target: 天兵机械兽

trans-unit.resname: TSB·111 | Mindless Automaton | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mindless Automaton comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 天兵机械兽进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·111 | Mindless Automaton | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton.
trans-unit.target: {1}，弃一张牌：在天兵机械兽上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·111 | Mindless Automaton | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 自天兵机械兽上移去两个+1/+1指示物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Mirari
trans-unit.target: 映奇宝珠

trans-unit.source: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以支付{3}。 若你如此做，则复制该咒语。 你可以为该复制选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: "It offers you what you want, not what you need."\n—Braids, dementia summoner
trans-unit.target: 「它能给你想要的，而不是给你需要的。」 ～惧像召唤师布蕾德

trans-unit.source: The Rack
trans-unit.target: 拷问台

trans-unit.resname: TSB·113 | The Rack | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As The Rack comes into play, choose an opponent.
trans-unit.target: 于拷问台进场时，选择一位对手。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·113 | The Rack | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 在该牌手的维持开始时，拷问台对该牌手造成X点伤害，X为3减去其手牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Invented in Mishra's earlier days, the rack was once his most feared creation.
trans-unit.target: 拷问台是米斯拉早期的发明，曾是他最令人畏惧的作品。

trans-unit.source: Serrated Arrows
trans-unit.target: 锯刺箭

trans-unit.resname: TSB·114 | Serrated Arrows | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Serrated Arrows comes into play with three arrowhead counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 锯刺箭进场时上面有三个箭头指示物。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·114 | Serrated Arrows | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若锯刺箭上没有箭头指示物，则牺牲之。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·114 | Serrated Arrows | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: {T}，从锯刺箭上移去一个箭头指示物：在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Tormod's Crypt
trans-unit.target: 托玛墓穴

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Remove target player's graveyard from the game.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲托玛墓穴：将目标牌手的坟墓场移出对战。

trans-unit.source: The dark opening seemed to breathe the cold, damp air of the dead earth in a steady rhythm.
trans-unit.target: 这黑暗入口好似稳定地呼吸着，散出死亡大地之湿寒空气。

trans-unit.source: War Barge
trans-unit.target: 战船

trans-unit.source: {3}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When War Barge leaves play this turn, destroy that creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: {3}：目标生物获得海岛行者异能直到回合结束。 当战船本回合离场时，牺牲该生物。 以此法被消灭的生物不能重生。

trans-unit.source: Arena
trans-unit.target: 斗技场

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to the other.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：横置由你操控的目标生物，与由对手选择、且由其操控的目标生物。 这两个生物各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Desert
trans-unit.target: 沙漠

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Play this ability only during the end of combat step.
trans-unit.target: {T}：沙漠对目标进行攻击的生物造成1点伤害。 你只可以于战斗结束步骤中使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·119 | Gemstone Mine | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: {T}，从宝石矿脉上移去一个采矿指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。 如果宝石矿脉上没有采矿指示物，则牺牲之。

trans-unit.source: Pendelhaven

trans-unit.target: {T}：目标1/1生物得+1/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks . . . Stand like Druids of eld."\n—Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, "Evangeline"
trans-unit.target: 「这是太古之树林。 絮絮细语的松与铁杉. . . 如德鲁伊长者般耸立。」 ～亨利·沃兹沃恩·朗费罗， 「伊文格琳」

trans-unit.source: Safe Haven
trans-unit.target: 安全庇护地

trans-unit.resname: TSB·121 | Safe Haven | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Remove target creature you control from the game.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：将目标由你操控的生物移出对战。

trans-unit.resname: TSB·121 | Safe Haven | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card removed from the game with Safe Haven to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以牺牲安全庇护地。 若你如此作，将所有以安全庇护地移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下放置进场。
